set.name: Mega Man: Rise of the Masters

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +3 or -2 speed. R [Once Per Turn]: After your opponent plays an ability on a non-character card that modifies the speed of an attack, cancel it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, all speed bonuses get +1. R Commit: Before the Block Step, return this attack to its printed speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack's speed is 5 or more, change its zone to any other zone. Multiple copies of this attack also gain this enhance.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack's speed is 5 or more, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Whenever this attack's speed is reduced below 4, return it to its printed speed. [Air] E: If this attack's speed is 7 or more, it gets +1 to its powerful rating.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent's attack receives a speed bonus, it gets -X speed. X equals double that speed bonus.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent chooses not to attempt to block your attack, it gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets +1 or -1 speed. E Commit: Seal 1 of your opponent's [All], [Death] or [Earth] foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove: Until the beginning of your next turn, your opponent must commit 1 foundation as an additional cost to play any ability that modifies the speed of an attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Choose a block zone. Blocks with the chosen zone get +2 to their modifiers for th rest of this turn. E (4+): If your attack is partially blocked, it gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Your turn] Discard 1 momentum: After your unblocked face up attack resolves, you may attempt to play it from your card pool. R: Before your attack's Block Step, return it to its printed damage and draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is partially blocked, add it to your hand after it resolves.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack may only be blocked by mid blocks.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent's high block modifiers get +2. R Discard 1 attack: After your opponent plays a card as a block against this attack, change this attack's zone to mid.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: Your next [Earth] attack this turn gets +2 damage. Your next [Fire] attack this turn gets +2 damage. Only 1 copy of this ability may be played per Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your attack is partially blocked, it gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your unblocked face up attacks get +1 damage for the rest of this turn. R Destroy: After you check an attack, add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After your opponent partially blocks your attack, seal their block.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you check a foundation to play an attack, that attack gets +2 damage. E [Twice per turn]: You may add 1 foundation from your discard pile to the top of your deck. Ready 1 non-unique foundation that has not been readied this Combat phase. Remove the next card you check this turn from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, at the start of each player's End Phase, that player may ready 1 foundation. F Commit: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a foundation, add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Add 1 foundation to the top of your deck: This attack gets +1 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard the top card of your deck: This attack may not be blocked by cards of the same type as the discarded card. Dr. Cossack First E Discard 1 momentum: This attack may only be blocked by foundation cards. Return this attack to its printed damage and its damage may not be increased.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has a block, this attack gets -X damage (minimum 1). X equals that block's printed modifier.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with this card, add it to your staging area committed. R [Once per turn]: After this foundation is readied due to an effect, gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Once per turn]: After this foundation is readied due to an effect, draw 1 card. E Discard 1 momentum: Ready this foundation. Playable while commited.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your next attack this turn gets -3 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +1 damage for each foundation that has been destroyed this turn (maximum 5). R [Once per turn]: After you destroy a foundation, add the top card of your deck to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Destroy all foundations and assets in both staging areas. Add the top card of your deck to your staging area face down. Your Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, after each player's Ready Phase, that player adds the top card of their deck to their staging area face down committed. E Destroy 1 face up foundation: Your attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Reveal 1 ally attack from your hand: Your opponent reveals 1 card from their hand. You may choose to have them discard that card and draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent destroys 1 ready foundation. E Destroy 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed for each foundation that has been destroyed this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your opponent destroys 1 ready foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Your opponent destroys 1 foundation. This attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Reveal 1 ally attack from your hand: This attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool]: After you play this card, it gets Stun: 2, Powerful: 2 or Breaker: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: The next time you destroy a foundation this Enhance Step, add the top card of your deck to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -2 speed. E Reveal 1 ally attack from your hand: If your next attack this turn is not a copy of the revealed card, your opponent discards 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Your attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 damage for each foundation that has been destroyed this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed, add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Once per turn]: After you destroy a foundation during the Enhance Step, your attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Discard 1 ally attack from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: After your opponent plays an ability on a non-character card that modifies the difficulty of a card, cancel it. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with a card named Gemini Man, add it to your staging area and draw 1 card. E: Your attack gets +1 speed. Your attack gets +1 damage and +1 speed for each character card in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, all attacks get -1 speed. E Commit: Add 1 character card from your staging area to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard the top 10 cards of your deck. E: If there are 2 or more character cards in your staging area, this attack gets Multiple: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next 2 checks to play slam attacks this turn get +2. Combo E Discard 1 momentum: Choose 1 character card in your discard pile with the same name as your starting character. Add that card to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed for each character card in both staging areas.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy: Add 1 character card from your discard pile to the top of your deck. E Destroy: Add 1 character card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: If this attack is blocked, it deals no damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +4 damage. R Commit: After you make a check, it gets +1 for each character card in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -1 damage and -2 speed for each character card in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): Your attack gets +1 damage for each unique attack zone printed on cards in your card pool. R: After your attack is completely blocked, your opponent commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove: After your non-throw attack deals damage, draw 1 card for each unique attack zone printed on cards in your card pool. R Remove, discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays a form ability on an action or asset, cancel it and draw 1 card. If that ability was on an asset, destroy it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card. E: If this attack is completely blocked, your next low or mid attack this turn gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent may not attempt to partially block this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Order E: If this attack is completely blocked, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations. Chaos E: If this attack is completely blocked, your next check to play a low or high attack this turn gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 damage for each unique attack zone printed on cards in your card pool. R Destroy: After your high or low attack is completely blocked, your next mid attack with a printed difficulty of 4 or less this turn gets Multiple: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your low attack gets Stun: 1. R Flip: After a stun attack is completely blocked, your opponent commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack is completely blocked, draw 1 card. E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your high attack gets +1 damage. R Commit 1 foundation: Before your attack's Block Step, return its zone to its printed zone. Your opponent may not attempt to partially block this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Once per turn]: After you play an attack card, choose Breaker: 2, Powerful: 2 or Stun: 2. That card gets the chosen keyword if it does not have it already. E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +1 damage for each keyword on it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block a high attack with this card it deals no damage. E: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 attack with 2 or more keywords discarded in this way to your hand. Discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn] Remove: Your opponent reveals their hand. Gain 1 vitality for each keyword on the cards revealed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F [Once per turn]: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. You may add 1 asset or character among them to your hand. Discard the remaining cards. R Remove, discard 1 momentum: Before the Damage Step of your opponent's unblocked attack, reduce its damage to your current vitality minus 1 (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 damage and +1 to its stun rating.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is completely blocked, choose 2 of your opponent's foundations. Those cards do not ready during their next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block an attack with this card, that attack deals no damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: You may discard 1 card with 2 or more keywords from your card pool in addition to momentum to pay the cost of this attack's multiple ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets Powerful: 2 or Stun: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: All E: Draw 1 card. Void E: If this attack played as a reversal deals damage, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: After you play a breaker ability, its rating gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn] Discard 1 momentum: If there are 3 or more different keywords on attacks in your card pool, add the top card of your opponent's deck to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: This attack may only be blocked by cards that share at least 2 resource symbols with your opponent's character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed by your opponent's effect, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 card: Before your End Phase, add 1 attack from your card pool to your hand. Only playable if there are 5 or more different keywords on attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Name a keyword. Your opponent's attack gets -X damage or -X speed. X equals the number of attacks with that keyword in their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After you play an attack card, it gets +1 to its breaker, powerful, or stun rating.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your non-throw attack deals damage, add it to your staging area face down during the End Phase. E Discard 1 card: Add 1 face down foundation to your hand. Your attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Change this attack's zone to any other.

property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, add it to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, you may attempt to block multiple copies with it as though it were in your hand. E Destroy 1 foundation: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the printed difficulty of the top card of your discard pile (maximum 6)

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before your attack's Block Step, if its damage is less than its printed damage, it gets +2 damage. R: Before your attack's Block Step, if its speed is less than its printed speed, it gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Metal Man E: Your attack gets +1 speed. E Destroy 1 foundation: If the top card of your discard pile is not a foundation, add 1 card from your hand to your staging area face down and draw 1 card.

property.value: After you block with this card, both players commit 1 foundation. E Flip: Both players commit 1 face down foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Flip: Add 1 face down foundation to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Checks your opponent makes during attacks get -1. E: Your opponent makes a check against a difficulty of 5. If it fails, this attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Whie this card is in your staging area, checks to play non-attack cards get -1. E: Your opponent makes a check against a difficulty of 4. If it fails, this attack gets -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent makes a check against a difficulty of 6. If it fails, this attack gets +2 speed and your next attack this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Checks your opponent makes during this attack get -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent makes a check against a difficulty of 6. If it fails, draw 2 cards. E Discard 1 momentum: this attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed. Your opponent's next check this Enhance Step gets -2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent makes a check that is not being made to play a card, that check gets -2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent makes a check against a difficulty of 5. If it fails, commit this card and your attack gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent fails a check, draw 1 card. E Discard 1 momentum: Ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Your turn] Commit: After your opponent commits 1 or more foundations to pass a check, choose 1 of those foundation. It does not ready during their next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After your blocked attack resolves, discard it from your card pool and your opponent loses 1 vitality. E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage and +X speed. X equals the number of cards that have been discarded from your card pool this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card does not county towards progressive difficulty. F: For the rest of this Combat Phase, whenever 1 or more cards are discarded from your card pool, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an attack, add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: After this attack resolves, discard it from your card pool and draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 foundation from your card pool: Your attack gets +2 damage. If it deals damage, add 1 copy of that foundation from your discard pile to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Discard 1 card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is discarded from your card pool, add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After an attack is played, it gets Flash. First F Destroy 1 foundation: For the rest of this turn, your flash attacks get +2 speed and whenever 1 of your flash attacks with a printed difficulty of 4 or more deals damage, your opponent adds 1 foundation to their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Lose X vitality: Before the Damage Step of your opponent's attack, it deals no damage. Add 1 of your opponent's foundations to their hand. X equals half of that attack's damage (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this attack's powerful ability, it gets Flash and no more enhances may be played this Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 flash attack discarded this way to your hand. E Commit: Your opponent discards 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play an attack, it gets +2 damage or +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy 1 foundation: After you play an attack, it gets +1 speeed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed, your opponent discards 1 momentum. R Destroy: After you play an attack, it gets Flash.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready, your second attack during your turn gets -3 difficulty, +3 damage and +1 speed. R: After your opponent plays their second attack of a turn, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with this card, if you checked an attack card in order to play it, add this card to your staging area. While this card is ready, you may attempt to block with it from your staging area as though it were in your hand during the Block Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this is your second attack this turn, add it to the top of your deck after it resolves. E: If this is your second attack this turn, add it to the top of your deck during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Change the zone of this attack's multiple copies to low. Combo E: Draw 1 card. This attack and its multiple copies get +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When you clear this card from your card pool during the End Phase, look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it. E: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: All E Commit: If this is your second attack this turn, draw 1 card. Evil E Commit: If this is your opponent's second attack this turn, it gets -3 speed. Life E Commit: If this is your second attack this turn, it gets +3 speed.
